meanings.definition: The quality of being boastful or excessively proud.
meanings.sent1: Her boastfulnesses made her unpopular with her classmates.
meanings.sent2: His constant boastfulnesses about his achievements annoyed everyone around him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his boastfulnesses, he couldn't hide his insecurities.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak stood tall with the boastfulnesses of a king.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the peacock's feathers were a natural boastfulnesses.

meanings.definition: An instance of bragging or showing off.
meanings.sent1: The child's boastfulnesses about his new toy were met with eye rolls.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but roll her eyes at his constant boastfulnesses.
meanings.sent3: His boastfulnesses about his video game skills were amusing to his friends.
meanings.sent4: The flashy sports car was a boastfulnesses on wheels.
meanings.sent5: The extravagant mansion was a boastfulnesses of wealth and success.
